metadata.title: CVE-2024-0110 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit contains a vulnerability in command `cuobjdump` where auser may cause an out-of-bound write by passing in a malformed ELF file. Asuccessful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to code execution ordenial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
